title: NA_5MT_TY752_TY753
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY752/TY753
Notes: Phase 1 era NA 5MT family

title: NA_5MT_TY754
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY754
Notes: Stronger than early; common

title: NA_5MT_TY755
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90/4.11
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY755
Notes: Final drive varies by model; match rear diff

title: WRX_5MT_390
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY754
Notes: Classic WRX 5MT; reliability risk at high power

title: WRX_5MT_370
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.70
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY755
Notes: Unique 3.70 FD; must match rear diff

title: AUTO_4EAT_390_P1
body:
Type: AT
Gears: 4
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: 4EAT
Notes: Early 4EAT; match rear diff

title: AUTO_4EAT_411_P2
body:
Type: AT
Gears: 4
Final Drive: 4.11
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: 4EAT
Notes: Later 4EAT; common

title: STI_6MT_TY856
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 6
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: DCCD
Family: TY856
Notes: Requires R180 3.90 and STI driveline parts; pull-type clutch

title: Manual Trans Fluid Capacity
body: 2.2 Liters (2.3 Quarts). Use GL-3 or GL-4 75W-90.

title: Auto Trans Fluid Capacity
body: 7.5 Liters (Total Dry Fill). Use Toyota ATF WS.

title: Manual Trans Fluid Capacity (FA24)
body: 2.2 Liters (2.3 Quarts). Use GL-4 75W (Toyota MT Gear Oil LV).
notes: Spec changed from GL-3 75W-90 in Gen 1 to GL-4 75W LV in Gen 2.

title: Auto Trans Fluid Capacity (FA24)
body: 7.5 Liters (7.9 Quarts). Use Toyota ATF WS.
